question:
In nation Z, 10 terble coins equal 1 galok. In nation Y, 6 barbar coins equal 1 murb. If a galok is worth 40% more than a murb, what is the ratio of the value of 1 terble coin to the value of 1 barbar coin?
(A) \(\frac{3}{5}\)
(B) \(\frac{11}{13}\)
(C) \(\frac{3}{7}\)
(D) \(\frac{21}{23}\)
(E) \(\frac{21}{25}\)
